survey_name: Workplace AI Tool Adoption and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and adoption rates of AI-powered tools in the workplace, focusing on usability, impact on productivity, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which AI-powered tools do you currently use in your daily work? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: AI-Powered Email Sorting and Prioritization Tools
AI-Powered Data Analysis and Reporting Tools
AI-Powered HR Support Tools (e.g., leave requests, policy queries)
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify the most commonly used AI tools. Consider using a multi-select format for accurate data collection.
questions.scripter_notes: Ensure the 'Other' option includes a text field for manual entry.

script.question_text: Which AI-powered tools do you currently use in your daily work? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: AI-Powered Email Sorting and Prioritization Tools
AI-Powered Data Analysis and Reporting Tools
AI-Powered HR Support Tools (e.g., leave requests, policy queries)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI tools provided by your organization?
questions.routing_logic: Displayed if Q1 does not include 'None'
questions.client_notes: A 5-point Likert scale is recommended for measuring satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI tools provided by your organization?
script.routing_logic: Displayed if Q1 does not include 'None'

questions.question_text: What is the primary benefit you experience from using AI tools at work?
questions.routing_logic: Displayed if Q1 does not include 'None'
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify perceived benefits to tailor future AI tool investments.
questions.scripter_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.

script.question_text: What is the primary benefit you experience from using AI tools at work?
script.routing_logic: Displayed if Q1 does not include 'None'

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using AI tools? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Displayed if Q1 does not include 'None'
questions.client_notes: This question identifies pain points to address in future training or tool selection.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-select dropdown with an 'Other' text field.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using AI tools? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Displayed if Q1 does not include 'None'

questions.question_text: How could the AI tools you use be improved?
questions.routing_logic: Displayed if Q1 does not include 'None'
questions.client_notes: An open-ended question provides qualitative insights for improvements.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text box for free-form responses.

script.question_text: How could the AI tools you use be improved?
script.routing_logic: Displayed if Q1 does not include 'None'

questions.question_text: If you do not use AI tools, what is the primary reason?
questions.client_notes: Helps identify barriers to adoption for targeted interventions.

script.question_text: If you do not use AI tools, what is the primary reason?
